(schema_documentation)=
# XML Schema Reference

This page provides automatically-generated documentation for the NexusLIMS
XML schema used to represent experimental records.

## Nexus Experiment Schema

The Nexus Experiment schema defines the structure of XML records generated
by NexusLIMS. Each record describes a microscopy session, including metadata
about the experiment, instruments used, and data files acquired.

```{eval-rst}
.. xsddoc:: ../nexusLIMS/schemas/nexus-experiment.xsd
```
